00001 /* 
00002  * jcom.velocity (previously names tl.velocity)
00003  * (1000*(x[n]-x[n-1]))/Æt
00004  * By Trond Lossius, Copyright © 2001-06
00005  * 20031227 modified for OSX compiling by jasch <jasch@kat.ch>

00011 
00012 #include "jamoma.h"
00013 
00014 #define nonzero(x)                              ((x > 0) ? x : 1.)
00015 
00016 typedef struct _velocity{               // Data structure for this object 
00017         t_object        ob;                             // Must always be the first field; used by Max
00018         void            *obex;
00019         float xn;                                       // Most recent value received
00020         float xn1;                                      // Previous value received
00021         long lasttime;                          // Time code for previous value received
00022         void *outlet;                           // Pointer to outlet, need one for each outlet
00023 } t_velocity;
00024 
00025 
00026 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message
00027 void *velocity_new(Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *arg);
00028 void velocity_bang(t_velocity *x);
00029 void velocity_int(t_velocity *x, long n);
00030 void velocity_float(t_velocity *x, double f);
00031 void velocity_set(t_velocity *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *setval);
00032 void velocity_assist(t_velocity *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00033 
00034 // Globals
00035 t_class         *this_class;                            // Required. Global pointing to this class 
00036 
00037 
00038 /************************************************************************************/
00039 // Main() Function
00040 int main(void)
00041 {       
00042         t_class *c;
00043         
00044         jamoma_init();
00045         
00046         // Define our class
00047         c = class_new("jcom.velocity",(method)velocity_new, (method)0L, (short)sizeof(t_velocity), (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00048         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_velocity, obex));                          
00049 
00050         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00051         class_addmethod(c, (method)velocity_bang,                       "bang",         A_CANT,         0);
00052         class_addmethod(c, (method)velocity_int,                        "int",          A_LONG,         0);
00053         class_addmethod(c, (method)velocity_float,                      "float",        A_FLOAT,        0);             
00054         class_addmethod(c, (method)velocity_assist,             "assist",       A_CANT,         0); 
00055     class_addmethod(c, (method)velocity_set,                    "set",          A_GIMME,        0);  
00056         class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,         "dumpout",      A_CANT,         0);  
00057     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref", A_CANT,             0);
00058 
00059         //finder_addclass("All Objects","jcom.velocity");               //a helping hand...
00060         //finder_addclass("Arith/Logic/Bitwise","jcom.velocity");
00061 
00062         // Finalize our class
00063         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00064         this_class = c;
00065         return 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 /************************************************************************************/
00070 // Object Life
00071 void *velocity_new(Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *arg)
00072 {
00073         t_velocity *x;
00074         
00075         x = (t_velocity *)object_alloc(this_class);     // create the new instance and return a pointer to it
00076         if(x){
00077         object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL));       // dumpout
00078                 
00079                 x->outlet = floatout(x);                                // create the outlet
00080                 
00081                 if (ac)                                                                 // initialize
00082                 {
00083                         if (arg->a_type==A_LONG)
00084                                 x->xn = (float)arg->a_w.w_long;
00085                         else if (arg->a_type==A_FLOAT) 
00086                                 x->xn = arg->a_w.w_float;
00087                         else
00088                                 x->xn = 0;
00089                 } else
00090                 {
00091                         x->xn = 0;
00092                 }
00093                 x->lasttime = gettime();
00094         }
00095         return(x);                                                                      // return pointer to instance
00096 }
00097 
00098 
00099 /************************************************************************************/
00100 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00101 
00102 
00103 // BANG input
00104 void velocity_bang(t_velocity *x)
00105 {
00106         long thistime;
00107         float vel;
00108         
00109         thistime = gettime();   
00110         vel = (1000 * (x->xn - x->xn1) ) / (nonzero(thistime - x->lasttime));
00111         x->lasttime = thistime;
00112         outlet_float(x->outlet, vel);
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 // INT input
00117 void velocity_int(t_velocity *x, long n)
00118 {
00119         x->xn1 = x->xn;
00120         x->xn = (float)n;
00121         velocity_bang(x);
00122 }
00123 
00124 
00125 // FLOAT input
00126 void velocity_float(t_velocity *x, double f)
00127 {
00128         x->xn1 = x->xn;
00129         x->xn = f;
00130         velocity_bang(x);
00131 }
00132 
00133 
00134 // SET input
00135 void velocity_set(t_velocity *x, Symbol *s, short ac, Atom *setval)
00136 {
00137         if (ac)
00138         {
00139                 if (setval->a_type==A_LONG)
00140                 {
00141                         x->xn1 = x->xn;
00142                         x->xn = (double)setval->a_w.w_long;
00143                 }else if (setval->a_type==A_FLOAT)
00144                 {
00145                         x->xn1 = x->xn;
00146                         x->xn = setval->a_w.w_float;
00147                 }
00148         }else{
00149                 x->xn1 = x->xn;
00150                 x->xn = 0;
00151         }
00152         x->lasttime = gettime();
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 // Method for Assistance Messages
00157 void velocity_assist(t_velocity *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00158 {
00159         if(msg==1)
00160         { 
00161                 switch(arg)
00162                 {
00163                         case 0: sprintf(dst, "(int/float) most recent value ")
00164                         ;break;
00165                 }
00166         }
00167         else if(msg==2)
00168         {
00169                 sprintf(dst, "(float) velocity");
00170         }
00171 }
